This structure was a large temple in the city of [[Unthalass]], in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], dedicated to the [[Untheric pantheon|Untheric god]] [[Ramman]].<ref group="note" name="identity">This temple was not provided a proper name in [[Old Empires (sourcebook)|''Old Empires'']]. For the sake of coverage, "Temple of Ramman" is used to represent it.
document_data.History: During the tyrannical reign of the god-king [[Gilgeam]], this and other temples of Ishtar were mandated to turn over half of their funds to him.<ref> The [[priest]]hood of the temple was ambivalent towards the growing rebellion against Gilgeam's reign, feeling certain that Gilgeam's forces would inevitably crush the rebels.
